org.openscience.cdk.io

Class PDBWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.io.DefaultChemObjectWriter
      • org.openscience.cdk.io.PDBWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChemObjectIO, IChemObjectWriter

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.io.PDBWriterTest")
public class PDBWriter
extends DefaultChemObjectWriter
    Saves small molecules in a rudimentary PDB format. It does not allow writing of PDBProtein data structures.
    Author:
    Gilleain Torrance
    Belongs to CDK module:
    io
    Source code:
    HEAD
